entries.s_fcb2db97: Let's see what I can do about making Dantooine safe for smuggler kind.
entries.s_fa259cfa: The Imperials are giving it to YOU straight - with both barrels! Come on, now! Where's your pirate pride?
entries.s_f8e8d1ee: The Imperials have captured a Black Sun transport. It's carrying some good contraband - the kind of thing that would eventually end up in our pockets, if the Imperials would just mind their own business.
entries.s_f8674c23: Where am I supposed to meet him?
entries.s_f43dd2bd: Jabba works all the angles! Things are different with Talon. He's no fan of the Empire. Are you willing to aim your blasters at those TIE fighters?
entries.s_f1aeca8b: Sounds like you're really in love with yourself.
entries.s_f17a86bc: I'll just say one word: Dathomir.
entries.s_f14cd6bf: Really, I don't! I didn't have any time for gossip. I was too busy working.
entries.s_f13c9503: Now that Jabba's happy, you're free to work with Talon Karrde again. But Talon's busy. So you're reporting to me!
entries.s_ed173ecd: What happened? Did you blow your paycheck at the cantina?
entries.s_e9cabb66: Eh, you're in luck. Normally I would send you packing, but I do actually have a couple of duty missions . Do you want me to give you a briefing?
entries.s_e9b39b51: Lok! Prettiest corner of the galaxy. Although you won't be doing any business on the surface. This is strictly a space mission.
entries.s_e9125b15: But the question is, what have you done for me lately? So let's get to work. Had enough of this place?
entries.s_e775f9ef: Anytime! I'm a generous Rodian. See me later.
entries.s_e6d5d85c: It means that Jabba's paid us for services rendered! And since YOU'RE the one that rendered said service, here's a little cut.
entries.s_e61fa67b: So you're just a freedom fighter.
entries.s_e5da4e7: Then there's a Nym smuggler who needs an escort if he's going to make it though Lok space. As you can see, we have lots of opportunities here to earn Nym's gratitude. And that's a good thing.
entries.s_e56b171a: I thought I was done with him.
entries.s_e46f0376: Hey, you're still in one piece. I guess those Alliance boys didn't work you over TOO hard. Are you looking for work?
entries.s_e3cee4d9: Techniques! Done! Now then. You did good work with Jabba.
entries.s_e2084aee: What do you know about the Black Sun?
entries.s_e15e4244: You're upsetting me! And I don't LIKE getting upset! Get back to work! And do the job right this time!
entries.s_e00688cd: OK smartmouth, that's enough out of you. Just get back to work!
entries.s_df1485b: Don't beat around the bush! Just give it to me straight.
entries.s_dd5bf0f8: Not for us, they're not! Talon and the Black Sun have an... understanding. A lucrative one.
entries.s_dbb3b0b0: How about heavy starship component use?
entries.s_db65cfb3: Well...we really try to help people who can help US later on.
entries.s_db089cf0: What are you trying to say?
entries.s_da0b2b1e: Now then. You did good work with Jabba.
entries.s_d48df184: Well listen up, there's a whole galaxy of booty out there, ripe for the picking! It's time for you to branch out, see what's out there. Think you're up to it?
entries.s_d2c2dc92: I'm warning you buddy - it's the big time! Lots of unsavory elements flying around out there!
entries.s_cf53514d: I hope so! Go on, get out of here!
entries.s_cad10f7b: It's simple. We just try to help people in need.
entries.s_c91fbb55: And if you just feel like blasting everything in sight, I could send you out a Dantooine patrol! Everybody's out there these days: CorSec, RSF, Imperial, even Valarian ships. Plenty of targets. So which one is it going to be?
entries.s_c870211d: OK! That's all I need to hear. Now listen up! Here's the situation. One of Nym's ships is carrying a load of spice - although you didn't hear that from me. You're going to transfer that spice to a Hutt smuggler.
entries.s_c758f78a: I can't tell you what I don't know!
entries.s_c4b1700b: You've got to finish what you've started.
entries.s_c40a86d2: Components! Done! Now then. You did good work with Jabba.
entries.s_c4076628: First, I TELL you what to do.
entries.s_c39e9b19: Depends. I don't want to get sucked into their world.
entries.s_c1ff5062: I'm looking for a mission. Do you have any?
entries.s_bdae1e2f: Vessels! Done! Now then. You did good work with Jabba.
entries.s_bd9c8748: She's definitely the UGLIEST - and that's saying something! Jabba's not exactly easy on the eyes. And forget about Lady Valarian becoming the top player. It'll never happen.
entries.s_bc331bd7: Nothing to tell. I'm here to get a mission!
entries.s_baacb22a: Sure! We all need a little something now and then. Come back when you're ready for more.
entries.s_b6298a33: Is there any part of that you don't understand?
entries.s_b5a3db93: Then why have we got this situation?
entries.s_b504a09d: Hey! Good idea! Listen pal, there's a whole galaxy of booty out there, ripe for the picking! It's time for you to branch out, see what's out there. Think you're up to it?
entries.s_b2909765: Why not? They're useful, in their way.
entries.s_b1d60b3e: He's stationed on Corellia, in Doaba Guerfel. He is expecting someone from our operation to show up... and I think that someone should be you. I can't force you to go. It's up to you, but I think it would be a smart move, %TU.
entries.s_b16ff72d: Lots of people in this system hate the Valarians. They appreciate what you did. It's good publicity for the Smugglers Alliance, see.
entries.s_b00344d: Droids! Done! Now then. You did good work with Jabba.
entries.s_ae9a6733: Of course. Come see me when you're ready for some more interstellar action!
entries.s_ae92ea5d: You tell ME how tough it is - when you get back from Dantooine!
entries.s_ac1da756: What are the Rebels planning to do?
entries.s_aba2cf17: Sounds that way! They are in Lok. Get going.
entries.s_aa6112c9: An Imperial freighter? Sounds like a tough assignment. I'll take it.
entries.s_a87f150c: You know Jabba was always trying to make backdoor deal with the Imperials.
entries.s_a6359b23: That's the smell of money, %TU! Jabba's a good ally for us. He's the strongest crime lord in the system, by far.
entries.s_a59a1d43: Skip the lecture and give me a mission! I need the money.
entries.s_a38a9e82: Nope! I think I got it.
entries.s_a1c0645d: The Imperials have captured a Black Sun freighter. It's carrying some good contraband - the kind of thing that would eventually end up in our pockets, if the Imperials would just mind their own business.
entries.s_9f0981a2: What's in a name? You can just call me Sir.
entries.s_9c834ac9: OK tough guy, have it your way. Let's get down to business. We need to help Jabba.
entries.s_9a63e564: Pilots like you receive skills training. And you'll be getting that training from me. So get ready! And pick your poison.
entries.s_96d69e86: Especially smugglers! Here's your pay. Nice work out there.
entries.s_95c7e5cc: He is, isn't he? I've heard stories.
entries.s_95b55346: I just got a communique from Alliance headquarters. Admiral Burke is asking us for help. They're in a jam, and they are looking for the best pilots they can find.
entries.s_94e9bd3b: I don't want you to join ANYTHING. But I'll tell you one thing, if the Alliance is going to do something big, you can be sure that the Empire will be involved. And the way I see it, anything that is bad for the Empire is good for us.
entries.s_92118a17: Talon and the Black Sun have an... understanding. A lucrative one.
entries.s_90f41db9: Don't bother! He's too busy to deal with the likes of you. As far as you're concerned, I AM Talon Karrde.
entries.s_8ee47f8c: Jabba's always working an angle. And we haven't heard much from him lately. Is he planning something in Dathomir?
entries.s_8d8e36c9: We're doing our part to keep Jabba on top. And that leads me to your next assignment.
entries.s_8c39d757: Why would we want to help the Rebellion?
entries.s_8945d3f4: Smugglers like us, we have a code.
entries.s_88926265: Here's a little something to tide you over until your next mission. Don't spend it all in one place.
entries.s_879f33d: I'm assuming you have work for me.
entries.s_8782c730: You guessed right. Let's see what I've got on my roster! If you want to be a hero to Nym's group, you could rescue one of his transports. CorSec and RSF ships are attacking it as we speak!
entries.s_87550112: If you want to be a hero to Nym's group, you could rescue one of his transports. CorSec and RSF ships are attacking it as we speak!
entries.s_85c8a240: What about the Black Sun? Don't they want to save their own ship?
entries.s_851d7ea3: Well, it's a little hard to explain.
entries.s_842eb2d9: Well, good pilots don't flub missions!
entries.s_81f135c8: Time for you to get to work! You're no use to me when you're just standing around. What are you going to do? Or do you need me to explain the situation to you again?
entries.s_8138df62: Jabba's a good ally for us. He's the strongest crime lord in the sector, by far.
entries.s_7b6327ac: And they are CONNECTED. They've got their fingers in every pie.
entries.s_7934ba4d: Sure! It'd be REAL easy, if the Imperials would just mind their own business! But I think you can count on some interference from Imperial forces.
entries.s_76e45e0f: If I give you another shot, do you think you can handle it?
entries.s_74aa808d: If you want to stick it to the Imperials, you could liberate - wink, wink - one of their freighters and bring it to a hyperspace jump point. We could always use something like that.
entries.s_71d95498: So you want me to join the Rebellion?
entries.s_70a95d7f: False modesty! I love it. Here's your cut. Let me know when you're ready to do some more work for Talon.
entries.s_70597637: I want you to start targeting enemy forces - starting with an Imperial Ace. Everybody hates the Imperials!
entries.s_6f729033: Okay. Suit up. You're going back out there.
entries.s_6c6479e8: All your action's going to be in Lok. Later on, you'll be targeting CorSec forces, even RSF - all the guys that do their part to stifle and subjugate the masses.
entries.s_6bc1a8b4: Sure is! They're killers and sociopaths, but they're good earners. And they need our help.
entries.s_69647725: Actually, no, you didn't. Talon said it! Maybe Talon was wrong!
entries.s_694ce3f1: Could you explain it to me again?.
entries.s_67ec71d0: Hey, there you are. Ready to get back to work?
entries.s_636f3f4d: Sure is! The Black Sun are killers and sociopaths, but they're good earners. And they need our help.
entries.s_616c8086: If Jabba's happy, we're happy. We can't do our jobs without the love and affection of our local crime lords.
entries.s_5e6a9bde: No, I'M telling YOU to mind your OWN business! And your business is at Jabba's Palace! So start walking, bub.
entries.s_5c05ecff: I just did what I was told.
entries.s_5af217dd: Thanks. I think so! You're clear to leave anytime.
entries.s_59fffde8: Sure! But the ship's almost completely disabled, so the guys on board are no use. And there aren't any other Black Sun in the vicinity. We're it!
entries.s_593a67cd: Talon says you're a good worker. But I'll believe it when I see it!
entries.s_58b4c6a6: The last thing you want is a bunch of fighter aces gunning for you. Get back out there!
entries.s_5681e74d: He is one of the Alliance fleet commanders. He's got a force stationed in the Outer Rim. Not really sure what they are planning to do out there, but if he is looking for outside help, it must be something big.
entries.s_559912: Don't be so quick to judge me. I can get the job done.
entries.s_555c668c: I know all! Get your backside over to Jabba's Palace.
entries.s_50335ae8: So tell me. Did you hear any good rumors in Jabba's Palace?
entries.s_4e27fe11: I don't know what you're talking about.
entries.s_4bef9ff9: Then I guess I better get to work.
entries.s_4bb84e05: Jabba's happy. And that means I'm happy. And if I'm happy, you're happy!
entries.s_4bb3bd9d: Sounds like that poor smuggler needs my help.
entries.s_49155225: I want to see the back of you! Pronto!
entries.s_4854b859: I thought you told me you were the greatest pilot of all time.
entries.s_472841f4: Freight plans. I want to know what they're transporting!
entries.s_4499bb6: Valarians are becoming active around Dantooine. Too active, if you know what I mean. We need to nip that nonsense in the bud. I want you to disable a Valarian gunship and inspect it.
entries.s_443da380: Sure - for now. One of these days, Lady Valarian could become the strongest.
entries.s_3fac3195: THAT'S RIGHT! You must be some kind of mindreader! Maybe you should quit being a pilot and get a job reading palms down at the cantina!
entries.s_3c7012a7: No. I said I was good.
entries.s_3afa07bf: Hey! Don't be ungrateful. It's unattractive. If you want more, just ask me for another mission.
entries.s_39d3e7a3: I'm warning you now - it's the big time! Lots of unsavory elements flying around out there!
entries.s_38a1649f: Better make sure your blasters are operating at full capacity before you take off for Lok! Watch your back, %TU.
entries.s_36a61f55: OK! I get it! I'll get back to work!
entries.s_351c69aa: Don't bother! I know what you're going to say.
entries.s_33dc0069: If you say so! You'll find the coordinates in your ship's database. Bye now!
entries.s_324779f6: Do I have any missions? Yes. Do I think you can handle them? No. Why don't you go find your mama and quit bothering me.
entries.s_30ea47ea: There's CorSec, for one thing. Those guys are always mucking things up for us. Then you've got your stuck-up RSF forces. The Imperials would like us to straighten up and fly right - and that'll never happen! Even your old friend Lady Valarian is gunning for us, since we're aligned with Jabba.
entries.s_30a9191e: Hey! I've got no time for bums like you.
entries.s_30860224: So I'm gunning for the Imperials.
entries.s_303b5f14: Hey! There's my favorite bum now. I have some surprising news here for you.
entries.s_2e5c16e2: Oh come on! You're kidding, right? The Black Sun is the biggest criminal syndicate around. And they are CONNECTED.
entries.s_2a9aa104: Write that one down in your diary! I just gave you a compliment. I NEVER give compliments. It's a red-letter day.
entries.s_29b1a1b4: So I want to keep spreading the love. You're going to go on a goodwill mission.
entries.s_293b395b: Well...I want everybody to be free to do business with our smugglers, if that's what you mean!
entries.s_21cba89: Pirate life, my friend! There's no black and white. It's all just shades of gray.
entries.s_1d267ca4: I can't really say, since I don't know. But it won't kill you to see this Admiral and hear what he has to say, right? He can't exactly force you to do anything for him, but there is a lot of things a pilot can learn from the Alliance.
entries.s_1bfa482b: Good job with those Valarian fighters! You really put them in their place.
entries.s_1a5ce928: Time is money! And you're wasting time! I don't do business with malingerers!
entries.s_192c6747: Not likely. The Black Sun have their own code of ethics when it comes to business. They stick to their own.
entries.s_18b41c2f: OK! So far, so good. Mission accomplished. And in true pirate tradition, you get a little off the top.
entries.s_17dede1: You know I worked WITH the Empire when I was helping Jabba.
entries.s_164c9f60: If you say so! You'll find the coordinates in your ship's database. Bye now!
entries.s_15e60405: Lots of people in this sector hate the Valarians. They appreciate what you did. It's good publicity for the Smugglers Alliance, see.
entries.s_1371de7b: I'm always happy to see TIE fighter debris, floating through space. Nice work out there!
entries.s_13031eaa: What brings a pilot like you out this way? Surely you didn't come just to say hello.
entries.s_11ed6849: Valarians are starting to get active around Dantooine. Too active, if you know what I mean. We need to nip that nonsense in the bud. I want you to disable a Valarian gunship and inspect it.
entries.s_11bcf0c: I guess so! Let me know how it goes! Get to Dantooine and hurry up.
entries.s_10c507d9: Now that Jabba's content, we can go about our business.
entries.s_10652869: Try not to get killed. Get back out there.
entries.s_1056a46b: They sure are! But even they get into trouble now and then. Any interest in helping them out?
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (tatooine_privateer_tier4.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
